record.title: HOUR OF MEETING ON TOMORROW
record.narrative:
HOUR OF MEETING ON TOMORROW -- (House of Representatives - November 14, 2007)

[Page: H13943]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that when the House adjourns today, it adjourn to meet at 9 a.m. tomorrow.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Wisconsin?
